page.title: 05PEOPLE AND POPULATION
page.content: A steady population of about 375. Denton has an{age distribution}of 25% retired,75%{families.}At least 6 of our retired folk have raised their families here,now their children have settled with their own young ones.10% of families have teenagers or married children,90% have children under 13. Since 1978 30 babies have been born. {Accents:}a majority of Norfolk dialect _many London accents,1 German. Newcomers are welcomed & encouraged to join in with village activities,but those who enjoy a quiet life will have their privacy respected. The area has been spared modern development but has enough newcomers to keep the village viable.With the "Baby Boom" prospects look good for the future.
